thread.title: Warriors will begin title defense with key figure missing
thread.title_full: Warriors will begin title defense with key figure missing - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Ron Kroichick
title: Warriors will begin title defense with key figure missing
text:
Photo: Carlos Avila Gonzalez, The Chronicle Golden State Warriors' Coach Steve Kerr and Stephen Curry are seen in the second period during Game 5 of the Western Conference Finals on Wednesday, May 27, 2015 in Oakland, Calif. Golden State Warriors' Coach Steve Kerr and Stephen Curry are seen...
Nothing is different in some ways, as Sunday’s scene illustrated. Steve Kerr again attended practice, his second consecutive day on the court. Stephen Curry again was the last player to complete his work, launching jump shot after picturesque jump shot. Golden State Warriors' Coach Steve Kerr and Stephen Curry are seen in the second period during Game 5 of the Western Conference Finals on Wednesday, May 27, 2015 in Oakland, Calif.
